subject: Healthy life is your dream?
body:
Looking for an effective and cheap solution to have sex like you had 10 years ago?
Our pharmacy
Viagra, Cialis, Levitra, Valium, Phentermine - they are all licensed and are the best quality!
Go to the shop
There is no need to go to your local drug store!
With best regards,
Brittany Bowman
 
 
Bigman, ostavajsia, gde sidish, vozle Bagazhnika, no luchshe vstan dlia luchshego obzora i manevrennosti. Iz poslednih sil on eshche sumel povernut golovu nabok I uspel uvidet kartinu, zastavivshuiusia ego guby slozhitsia v slabuiu ulybku Udovletvoreniia. Ferma Okazalas ochen chistoplotnoj staruhoj. chto? Ty tak i ne smog ego dostat? Moemu razocharovaniiu ne bylo Granic. 
Bolshe drugih zakrepilos lish neskolko: Sobstvenno Tvar, Hishchnik, Vrag i Prokold. Zakryl glaza i Rasslabilsia, zaniavshis samovosstanovleniem s pomoshchiu Mobra, a kogda privel Nervy v poriadok i otkryl glaza snova, to neozhidanno obnaruzhil pered soboj Celitelia, s grustnym vidom razgliadyvaiushchego menia so svoego tabureta. Chistyj kamen. My zhe na tvoem charse poedem, da? Zdorovo! A kak. Po chernote dospehov proskochila pervaia blednaia i Korotkaia molniia, ugasnuv v vodianyh bryzgah. I ona effektno umolkla, nabliudaia, kak ia otreagiruiu. No tak kak zhizn tvoia mne eshche mozhet Ponadobitsia v dalnejshem, ia schel nuzhnym predupredit tebia ob opasnosti. Ia mog ne opasatsia, chto privleku k sebe Che-libo vnimanie, nechto tozhe staralos razdelatsia so mnoj bez shuma. 
Koroche Obezvredit nado bylo Dosa. Umom ia ponimal, chto sejchas Nori prosto marionetka i vypolniaet chuzhuiu Zhestokuiu voliu, no serdce ozhestochalos, vosstavalo i protiv samoj devushki. Magom on Tozhe byl odarennym. Iarostnyj krik zastrial v gorle. ejisuminyon XF5FVVtTW1Z0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
